page.title: 08HALLS AND BONAR,BIBBY&BARON
page.content:
These are the two main factories in our 1km square. {Bonar,Bibby & Baron}make paper and polythene bags. They make 22 million a week in a building dating from 1868. It originally made paper bags, but now concentrates on polythene. They supply Marks & Spencers, Burtons, and Silver Spoon sugar amongst others
{Halls}make bubble gum and chewing gum which is called 'freshen up'. Sometimes they make cakes and buns, but they are most famous for mentholyptus, and butter scotch which are both boiled sweets.
St. Peter's C.E. Primary
